21-037TI.summary: Recommendation to approve the minutes from the Technology & Innovation Commission meeting held, Wednesday, October 27, 2021.A motion was made by Chair Shaffer, seconded by Commissioner Brunson, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 6 - Lisa Mae Brunson, Justin Hectus, Gwen Shaffer, Parisa Vinzant, Andrea White-Kjoss and Robb KorinkeExcused: 1 - David FerrellPage 1 of 4TELECONFERENCE, 3:30 PMWEDNESDAY, DECEMBER 15, 2021CITY OF LONG BEACHTECHNOLOGY AND INNOVATION COMMISSION MINUTESUNFINISHED BUSINESS21-032TIRecommendation to receive and file a presentation on the Long Beach AR (Augmented Reality) Challenge and Exhibition, and updates on the Smart City Initiative programs.2.Lea Eriksen, Director of Technology & Innovation, spoke.Ryan Kurtzman, Smart Cities Program Manager, spoke.Commissioner White-Kjoss, spoke.Chair Shaffer, spoke.Commissioner Brunson, spoke.Commissioner Vinzant, spoke.Bill Sive, member of the public, spoke.Deputy City Attorney Erin Weesner-McKinley spoke.This agenda item was received and filed.Yes: 6 - Lisa Mae Brunson, Justin Hectus, Gwen Shaffer, Parisa Vinzant, Andrea White-Kjoss and Robb KorinkeExcused: 1 - David Ferrell3.
